name: Santa Brawls
description:
Summary

It is going to be Christmas soon, and it is the season of GIVING. You are Santa #43. Unfortunately, to your horror, there were no gifts being prepared, as the elves around the world just went on strike (in order to protest against their poor working conditions!)

With no gifts packed for Christmas, you decide to take matters into your own hands. Wrap as much candies as possible, then dump them into the sleigh! However, you are not alone in your frenzy packing fever; be prepared to fight for your share of the gifts, and give them hell.

Entered for the Yogscast Jingle Jam 2019.

Instructions - Controls

Keyboard 1:

  • Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Move
  • Up Arrow - Jump
  • Right Ctrl - Use (Attack, Take Item, Drop Item)

Keyboard 2:

  • A/D - Move
  • W - Jump
  • Q - Use (Attack, Take Item, Drop Item)

Xbox Controller:

  • Left Thumbpad - Move
  • A - Jump
  • X - Use (Attack, Take Item, Drop Item)

Instructions - Gameplay

  1. Collect the candy.
  2. Drop the candy at the "Gift Wrapping" section.
  3. Wait until the candy is fully wrapped into a gift.
  4. Collect the gift.
  5. Drop the gift at the sleigh.

The player with the most delivered gifts wins.

Other players can force you to drop what you are holding by pressing the "Use" key.

You can also use the "Use" key to break the snowman on the platform that is blocking your way.
